page.title: 13TRAFFIC SURVEY-Harvey Road
page.content: Harvey Road is part of the{Inner Ring {Road}in{Derby.}It stretches from the junction of{Osmaston Park Rd./Osmaston {Rd.}and{Chellaston Road}at Allenton. It is a very busy road and many of us have to cross it to get to school. We carried out our{survey}between{ {9.40am}and{9.50am}on a weekday and here are the results. {TRAFFIC SURVEY RESULTS } 1 Cars...................144{ }1 {2 Buses....................5 } {2 3 Lorries.................44 { }3 {4 Vans....................25} {4 5 Bicycles.................5 { }5 {6 MotorBikes...............5 6 {7 } Ambulance................3{ }7 {8 Cars + Caravan...........1} {8 9 Waste Disposal Lorries...1 { }9 {10 Milk Float...............1} {10 This is a total of{234 vehicles}in {10 minutes}or{1,404 vehicles per hour.
